features: 【Heavy Duty Dustpan with Long Handle】This Metal Dust pans is equiped with 4 poles which can be removed and attached, Freely switch between a long-handled dustpan and a short small dustpan, you can adjust handle from 32.8" with 3 poles To 43.3" with 4 poles To furnish you with the perfect length for home and kitchen cleaning, makes you more comfortable and easy work with cleaning without bending over

【Sturdy Dust pan for Indoor and Outdoor】Our heavy duty dust pan is made of premium quality stainless steel, rustproof, lightweight but sturdy. Silver Metal Dustpan is decent to use indoor and outdoor, it can be used as an indoor dustpan for home or an commercial dustpan for shop, lobby, office

【Stainless Steel Dust pan with Ergonomic Design】The metal dustpan is designed in an integrated process, not spliced, without any gap to ensure no crumbs are left behind ! 45°Large angled head makes sweeping hard-to-reach corners, baseboards, and under furniture quick and efficient,The ergonomic design makes it easy and labor-saving, A best choice for everyday home essential

【Standing Dustpan for Home and Kitchen】This upright dustpan has clips onto broom handle for convenient and compact storage when you're done cleaning，In addition, you can also hang it up, save your space and easy for moving, also, the installation process for this heavy duty dust pan is very convenient and quick with spiral joint, easy to twist and assemble tightly

【Indoor and Outdoor Dustpan】 This Dust pan can be the outdoor dustpan which can be used on most floor surfaces, including wood, linoleum, tile, concrete and cement. Or an indoor dustpan which is ideal for home, kitchen, Yard, driveways or industrial spaces, shop, garages, warehouse

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Long Handled Broom Dustpan The broom and dustpan set for home have soft and heavy duty bristles which can effectively grab dust and dirt. You can choose the length of the broom according to the height of the child or adult. allow you to be more comfortable and to sweep the floor without bending over. The long handle can help to clean upright and no longer bend over
Easy to Set up No installation tools required Thickened Stainless Steel One-piece Forming Smooth edge Multiple Spot Welding Firm and Durable

DURABLE TO USE High quality stainless steel,durable to use.360 degree without sharp angle, preventing scratching during use. Compared with the plastic dustpan, this dustpan doesn't rust and fade. FITS THE FLOOR SEAMLESSLY The lip of dustpan completely fit the ground and can easily capture tiny dust and little paper into the pan. So you don't have to try multiple times to sweep. 5 LAYERS BRISTLES The broom comes with unique 5 layers of high quality soft bristles, which cleans the floor more efficiently.Suitable for indoor and outdoor use.

Indoor & Outdoor Broom and Dustpan Set for Home! This broom and dustpan set for home can be used on a variety of surfaces in your home including wood, tile, and laminate floors, kitchen,garage, rv, lobby, camping, indoor and outdoor use and cleans well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and functional... albeit ... short
reviews.reviewText: I received and assembled this broom and was surprised to see how short the handle was ...After using it I found it was absolutely perfect for the purpose for which I bought it...I use it to quickly sweep the kitchen and dining area wood floors to rid those pesky crumbs and occasional dust "tumbleweeds" that are a part of everyday food preparation and dining ...The bristles are very soft and the right length and density to effortlessly sweep the floors ...I honestly love using this broom... a beautiful and nicely functional cleaning tool...Highly recommend...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Standup Dust Pan
reviews.reviewText: This is a very sturdy standup dust pan. I bought this metal dust pan because I wanted to leave it available to me outside on my covered porch. If I had purchased a plastic one, the AZ sun would likely have destroyed it in a year. It's light but very sturdy. Exactly what I was looking for. A plus is that you can make it shorter by eliminating 1 stem which I have done. If the stems loosen I'll just use a small piece of Vent Tape (aluminum tape to secure it so it won't loosen. This tapes adhesive does not breakdown in heat/cold like some other tapes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the dustpan
reviews.reviewText: Love the color. Broom just a little to soft, but love the dustpan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s easy to put together, and only for small messes , it’s not very sturdy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Most flimsy bristles I have ever seen
reviews.reviewText: This broom did absolutely nothing I needed it to. I bought it to sweep my dining room rug before vacuuming, and to sweep my porch. I use a hard wood vacuum for my floors. The bristles are soo soft and flimsy it didn’t sweep any debris up whatsoever. I love the way it looks, and it has loops to hang it up. Other than that there is nothing good about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am so happy with my broom and dust pan . No more having to pick up dust pan. It has just the right of weight to stay up while sweeping stuff up in it . I like the broom also . It attaches to the dust pan .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this set!
reviews.reviewText: I sweep everyday, multiple times a day. Not only is this set stylish hanging on my laundry wall, but the dustpan actually stays upright and is truly flat to get all debris into. I took off the little rings at the top of each handle because the jingling sound annoyed me, and took one pole link from the dustpan handle and added it to the broom handle for height since I’m tall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice broom and dust pan set
reviews.reviewText: I've had many dust pans and many brooms. The problem with many dust pans is that the dust pan itself will not lie flat on the floor, so one must sweep multiple times and often still cannot get all of the dust into the dust pan.I have had back surgery and am not supposed to bend my back, so I was looking for a standing dustpan and broom set. The broom is about average for the type of broom it is. Everything is aluminum except the bristles. Other reviewers disparaged the broom because it sounded "tinny" or something similar. Aluminum is a good metal and is perfect for this application because it is lightweight for the amount of strength. The dust pan is excellent. It's metal and has arrived to me perfectly level and straight, so it catches all of the dust and dirt I can brush up. Overall, it's an excellent product. The plastic ones would have just been frustrating, though they would be cool and the pan would swivel straight, and this one does not. That's a very minor price to pay for a dustpan that will actually do the job.
Hope it will keep up to the hard work my husband is going to put it through.
El problema es el mango que es muy delgado y no permite un buen agarre al momento de barrer
Para uso de interior están perfectas, atrapan el pelo de mi gato con facilidad

I read all the reviews on this dustpan before I purchased. The number 1 complaint about this product is, the handle keeps coming undone under use. The solution for this for any future person who buys this is, USE LOC-TITE! I put Loc-Tite on all the handle threads before I assembled them. They are rock solid and I have been using this now for almost a month. Loc-Tite on the threads that screw into the dust pan and Loc-Tite on every piece of the handle thread. You won't have any more problems! I am happy with my purchase, Heavy duty construction and is made of Stainless Steel!

reviews.reviewerName: Pedí escoba y recogedor y éste último no me llegó, y la escoba está sumamente bajita
reviews.reviewText: No es de tamaño adecuado y no me entregaron el recogedor
